trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnBeginResizing*> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnResizing*> methods.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs contains information used by an activity designer when a user resized the activity designer on a workflow design surface.
This information includes the designer edge that is being used to resize the designer and the designer's new bounds.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> value and <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> to use to resize the activity designer.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the resized bounds of the activity designer.
Gets the new bounding rectangle for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the new bounds of the activity designer.
Gets the designer edge used to resize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> used to resize the activity designer on the workflow design surface.
